Bordenese Liberation Front

General Information

Demonym Bordenese
Flavor Text "To whom we broke our promise."
Faction Color Purple
Peoples Bordenese, Albian
Class List Rifle, Grenadier, Engineer, Shotgun

Overview

Rostora is a nation in the continent of Pordier. Oskovia boasts a well-equipped army and is in conflict with Rostora and the disputed territory of Borden.

Appearance

In-game, the Rostoran uniform is reddish-grey.

Modifiers

On the barren map, the Bordenese Liberation Front has the following modifiers:

Rancor +35% Player cap
Militia - Assault Engine
- Barrage Events
- Pillbox
+10 seconds to spawn interval
Sticks & Stones -50% Build rate
+33% Shotgun cost
-4 Grenades for Grenadier
40% chance for rifle randomization

Trivia

  • Oskovia used to also fight Rostora in the old Umbral map...
  • Soldiers wear the same helmet models as Rostora...
